name: SQUAREBALL (itch) (Stagelily Studios)
description:
SQUAREBALL is a game about hitting a ball with a square, made in around 3 hours for the 83rd Mini Jam!

- Control a ball with your mouse

- Hit a square with that ball to keep it from falling into lava for 60 seconds

- Hit yellow diamonds with the square to subtract 20 seconds from the 60 seconds mentioned beforehand

- Yeah man that's it

Hey there! I really quick just wanted to mention that I am working on a full commercial release coming out in August that has a free alpha of the first few levels (Departure)  available now on my itch.io page. It really helps me make my game better. Thanks for reading this!
